enter-page.title: Enter the lockerverse
enter-page.description: The first-of-its-kind digital platform at the crossroads of sports, gaming, anime, fashion, art, and culture where we platform the personal collections of life’s greatest legends-in-the-making.

forgot-password.title: Forgot your password?
forgot-password.subtitle: Don’t worry! It happens. Please enter your registered phone number.
forgot-password.general-error: An error occurred. Please try again later.
forgot-password.reset-success: Your password has been successfully changed.
forgot-password.reset-failed: An error occurred. Make sure that new password is different than old one and try again.

main-page.text-1: The Lockerverse team is proud to exhibit the work and personas of legends as they're in the process of becoming. It is an epic undertaking that explores our talent in the great dimensions of their being, but also underscores the ways that they're just like us.
main-page.text-2: We're not only telling stories, We're telling the truth... With authenticity as our north star, we zero in on what makes our heroes grounded and relatable-the proverbial “everyman” that thrives behind the public persona.
main-page.text-3: We're not only telling stories, We're telling the truth... With authenticity as our north star, we zero in on what makes our heroes grounded and relatable-the proverbial “everyman” that thrives behind the public persona.
main-page.sub-header: The first-of-its-kind digital platform at the crossroads of sports, gaming, anime, fashion, art, and culture where we platform the personal collections of life's greatest legends-in-the-making.
main-page.what-is-nft-description: An NFT, short for 'Non-Fungible Token', is a digital asset existing on the blockchain that allows holders access to specific communities, platforms, and gated spaces.
main-page.nft-special-description:
Let's face it: being first is a flex. You were a first. When you were born, you came into this life being one of a kind. Why should your art be any different? Technology has given us the ability to magnify the lens of how we create, how we personalize. And at the center of this is you. NFT ownership is how tomorrow's visionaries are reclaiming our individuality and creativity by putting the power back in our hands. These are the spaces where we are defining our culture, giving wings to what matters most to us.


With new NFT collections coming out every week, it's getting increasingly difficult to separate the burnouts from the lasting legends, but Lockerverse tokens are here to stay. And you'll want one because everyone we welcome into our collective is here in earnest to explore, challenge, disrupt, and shape the canvas of the future. The metaverse is the wild west and we're trailblazing together. Follow the creatives making the biggest waves and enjoying knowing that you saw it first. Sure you can join us at any time, but journeys are always best when you start from the beginning.

prepay.secondary-title: Please, prepay NFT to claim it

pre-purchase-flow.banner-title:
Check out new collection
of Chase B

mint-instructions.mint-text: To mint and own a Bronny vs Bronald NFT, there are a couple of steps you must take to ensure you are ready to mint.
mint-instructions.guide-text: We will guide you through the steps required.
mint-instructions.risk-description: Cryptocurrency is an exciting new innovation. However, there are many risks associated with being involved in cryptocurrency and the Web3 space in general.
mint-instructions.note-1-text: Lockerverse will never send you a Direct Message on Twitter or public channels.
mint-instructions.note-2-text: You will receive Direct Messages from scammers impersonating Lockerverse.
mint-instructions.note-3-text: Do not click links if they are not posted on Lockerverse official channels.
mint-instructions.note-4-text: Always check the username. Updates will only come from @Lockerverse.
mint-instructions.note-5-text: Never share your password, private keys, or recovery phrase with anyone.
mint-instructions.note-6-text: Lockerverse will never ask you to manually input your password or recovery phrase.
mint-instructions.note-7-text: Please read and follow the actions in our Discord channel #stay-secure
mint-instructions.phantom-description: Phantom makes it safe & easy for you to store, buy, send, receive, swap tokens and collect NFTs on the Solana blockchain.
mint-instructions.phantom-description-2: This is a non-custodial wallet, meaning, you have full control over your investments, there is no central authority to support you.
mint-instructions.connect-wallet: Connect Phantom so we can scan the wallet IDs balance before step 2.
mint-instructions.wallet-not-installed: We detected you do not have Phantom installed.
mint-instructions.sol-description: SOL is the native cryptocurrency of the Solana blockchain. Today, 1 SOL = $X.XX.
mint-instructions.sol-balance-text: We recommend loading at least 3 SOL in your wallet to be in with a chance to mint a Bronny vs Bronald NFT.
mint-instructions.own-sol-text: You own this SOL, and it is your own responsibility. If you don't successfully mint an NFT, you will still own this SOL.
mint-instructions.early-access-text: Whitelist Tokens are used in order to gain early access to an NFT sale.
mint-instructions.sale-start-time-text: “Bronny WL Tokens” and “Bronald WL Tokens” will be available through our official channels.
mint-instructions.key-eye-on-updates-text: Keep an eye on Twitter and Discord to find opportunities to earn a Whitelist (WL) Token.
